sentences.en: A revision of Clematis sect . Aspidanthera s . l . ( Ranunculaceae ) ( Continued )
sentences.cn: 铁线 莲 属单性铁线莲组修订 ( 英文 )

sentences.en: A revision of Clematis sect . Brachiatae ( Ranunculaceae )
sentences.cn: 铁线莲属对枝铁线 莲 组修订 ( 英文 )

sentences.en: A revision of Clematis sect . Viticella ( Ranunculaceae )
sentences.cn: 铁线莲属铁线莲组修订 ( 英文 )

sentences.en: All virtues that are not limited to a sect: the universal virtues.
sentences.cn: 所有不只适用于某些方面的美德.可以叫‘通用的美德’吧.

sentences.en: Cynic is the member of a sect of ancient Greek philosophers.
sentences.cn: 犬儒学派是古代希腊哲学学派的成员.

sentences.en: Even for Gelug sect , does your status really surpass Panchen Lama?
sentences.cn: 即便是您所在的格鲁派,您的地位是否能够超越班禅额尔德尼?

sentences.en: Gerernal Raw propagandizing Sect : Responsible for propagandizing ECUPL and popularizing laws.
sentences.cn: 普法宣传部: 主要负责法援在校内外的宣传和法律的普及.

sentences.en: He established a religion, first a sect, you might say, then a religion, then eventually an empire, the Holy Roman Empire, that was established in the name of that teaching.
sentences.cn: 他建立了一个宗教，一开始是个宗派，然后是宗教，最后成为一个帝国，神圣罗马帝国，即是按着他,教诲的名义而建立。

sentences.en: He is the 53 th leader of the Chengdu Qingcheng Mountain Wudang Sect.
sentences.cn: 他是成都青城山武当派第五十三代掌门人.

sentences.en: He was rejoiced at so early an opportunity of distinguishing his faith in his new sect.
sentences.cn: 他很高兴这么快就能有机会表明他新近才参加的教派的信仰.

sentences.en: His sect is noteworthy because It'stresses absolute obedience to the guru ( teacher ).
sentences.cn: 他的教派值得注目,因为它强调绝对服从古鲁 ( 导师 ).

sentences.en: If I know your sect I anticipate your argument.
sentences.cn: 假如我知道你属于哪个教派,我就能预见到你会使用的论据.

sentences.en: Most sectarians are intolerant of the views of any other sect.
sentences.cn: 大部分宗派主义者不能接受其它宗派的观点.

sentences.en: That strange new religious sect conducts its services in dog Latin.
sentences.cn: 那个异国的新教教派用不正规的拉丁语做礼拜仪式.

sentences.en: The group breakaway Mormon sect that advocates polygamy and underage marriages.
sentences.cn: 该独立的摩门教派主张多偶和与未成人结婚.

sentences.en: The naturalist literary sect always thinks shallowly, which determines its short duration.
sentences.cn: 自然主义文学派别的思考往往是肤浅的, 这决定了它的短暂性.

sentences.en: The sect, which broke from the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints more than a century ago, believes polygamy brings glorification in heaven.
sentences.cn: 这个教派，原本是一个多世纪以前从摩门教末世圣徒教会分离出来的，相信一夫多妻制可以升上天堂。

sentences.en: Thus was the technology preserved through this holy sect. Many brilliant souls were among these.
sentences.cn: 因此，这技术是透过 神圣的教派所保存的 ，其中有许多才华横溢的灵魂。

words.tran_cn: 宗派的；偏狭的；党派心强的
属于宗派的人；宗派心强的人；宗派主义者
宗派成员；非教会派的新教徒

trans.tran_en: a group of people with their own particular set of beliefs and practices, especially within or separated from a larger religious group
